title: Battle Boss Malzahar Missing Particles. FIX ASAP.
body:
Battle Boss Malzahar it's missing it's Recall / Ultimate and Revive/Spawning Effects. (Circles) Haven't noticed anything else.'

https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/290042693697011712/433235149237256202/unknown.png 
For the full duration of the recall.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/290042693697011712/433235467438260244/unknown.png
During ultimate
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/290042693697011712/433235530637901824/unknown.png
During to what's left of the ultimate.
https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/290042693697011712/433235615924879360/unknown.png
During Revive/Spawn.


Compared to what it should be.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SO5WT9MSavI

Fix this asap.

replies.body: Everything should be fixed for 8.8 - just checked the recall, recall winddown and ult out on my machine and things appear to be back in place.
